history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER other countries
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Public transit please.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to say decide.
TTS Where are you going?For example, you can say I'm going to Squirrel Hill
USER I'm going to Shady Side.
TTS Okay, going to shadyside. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER I would like to leave from him you.
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Brendan and University
TTS Okay, leaving from university of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:40 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Hello.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 23 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Thanking you.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 6 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue opposite Thackeray avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 71B <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Negley avenue.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 10:47pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Shadyside. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
